attributes.action: Free prescription for working women who suffer from endremetiosis
attributes.additional_details: I'm a endremetiosis sufferer I've had 2 operations second one is a full historctomy  and I was 39 and know I have to take hrt for 10 years the pain still there and I'm on medication also costing me a fortune my partner has diebieties and gets free prescription  for life i just think endremetiosis is on going like that and it never will go away and I think there is a lot more people with endremetiosis than diabetics lets get this noticed ladies
attributes.background: Hi I'm a endremetiosis sufferer I've had 2 operations second one is a full historctomy  and I was 39 and know I have to take hrt for 10 years the pain still there and I'm on medication also costing me a fortune my partner has diebieties and gets free prescription
